full_summary:
# Enterprise Level License for Data Science Packages

## Announcement

The Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) has issued a Notice of Change (NOC) for the enterprise level license procurement of data science packages. The procurement aims to access enterprise package repositories for data analysis, scientific computing, and machine learning in a unified package management system.

## Tender Details

* Reference: PR122140-1000450691
* Publication Date: May 15, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: May 29, 2023 (02:00 PM ET)
* Expected Contract Start Date: June 1, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: May 31, 2024

## Contract Information

* Contractor Contact: Marie-Pier Leblanc (marie-pier.leblanc@cbsa-asfc.gc.ca) 
* Region of Delivery: National Capital Region (NCR)
* Contracting Authority: CBSA (Agence des services frontaliers du Canada)

## Requirement Description

The CBSA requires an enterprise level license to access a curated repository of data science packages for data analysis, scientific computing, and machine learning. The supplier will provide vetted and verified packages, perform security screening, validation, and compatibility checks. The contract period is one year, from June 1, 2023 to May 31, 2024.

## Notice Link

https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5566/pr122140---sow.pdf
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5566/pr122140---acan-en.pdf ( English version)
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5566/pr122140---edt_0.pdf
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5566/pr122140---acan-fr.pdf (French version)

## Tender Description

Please refer to the attached documents for more information about the requirement and how to submit a statement of capabilities. The closing date for the submission of a statement of capabilities is May 29, 2023, at 14:00 (02:00 PM ET).
